LANG_CHOOSE_GROUP_ADVICE: You are trying to change your language(not group)? Do that using /start in private chat
LANG_CHANGED: Ok, from now i will speak english 🇬🇧
LANG_CHANGED_GROUP: Ok, from now i will speak {lang} on this group
NEW_GROUP: Thanks for adding me to your group! • Don't forget to make me Admin of the group (see how), or i cant work correctly • Use /reload to verify that's all ok
PRESENTATION: 👋🏻 Hello {name}! @LibreGroupHelpBot is the free, open source and privacy respecting Bot alternative to Group Help to better manage your groups! 👉🏻Add me in a supergroup and set me as an Administrator to get me right into the action! ❓ What are the commands? Press /help to see all commands and how they work!
INFO: Libre Group Help runs under Nodejs and is an Open Source project that aims to offer a relaiable bot to manage your groups and be privacy respecting to it's users Bot version: {LGHVersion} Bot staff •@Sp3rick_hj, creator and first developer
SUPPORT_MESSAGE: 👉🏻 Send now a message with a request to the Staff. 💡The request has to be sent in one message only, other messages will be not received.
SUPPORT_SENT_CONFIRM: Message sent. We will reply as soon as possible.
SUPPORT_RECEIVED: 👤You received a message from the support, to respond reply this message
SETTINGS_WHERE_OPEN: Where do you want to open the settings menu?
SETTINGS_SELECT: Select one of the settings you want edit.
SETUP_GUIDE: In order to set me up, use /settings or press the underlying button.
RULES_SETTING: 📜 Group's regulations From here you can set the group rules that will be shown with the command /rules.
CHANGE_RULES_ADV: 👉🏻 Use the buttons below to select what you are going to edit
SET_MESSAGE_ADV: 👉🏻 Send now the message you want to set. You can send it already formatted or use HTML
SET_MEDIA_ADV: 👉🏻Send now any media (photo, video, sticker, file) you want to set. You can type a caption.
SET_BUTTONS_ADV: 👉🏻Send now the list of buttons to insert on the inline keyboard, with texts and links, using this format: Text button - link.com Text button - @LibreGroupHelpBot • If you want to set 2 or more buttons on the same row separe them with &&. Example: Website - https://github.com/ && Channel - @username
MEDIA_INCORRECT: ⚠️ Media was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR: ⚠️ Message was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR_TEXT: ⚠️ Message was not parsed properly. Please be sure to send a text message without media or any addition.
BUTTONS_ROWS_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 14 rows. Try again.
BUTTONS_CULUMNS_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 8 culumns. Try again.
BUTTONS_TOTAL_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 92 buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_MISSING_LINK: ⚠️ You didn't set a link to one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the name limit (64 characters) for one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_TOO_SHORT: ⚠️ You created one or more buttons without name. Try again.
BUTTONS_INVALID_LINK: ⚠️ A link for one or more buttons is invalid. Try again.
WELCOME_SETTING: 💬 Welcome Message From here you can set a welcome message sent when someone join the group.
W_SEND_EVERYTIME: Send the welcome message at every join of users in the group
W_SEND_ONCE: Send the welcome message only at the first join of the user in the group
ADV_REPORT_ISSUE: If you think it is an error please report it to https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp/issues
